Caption:Imaging modalities together with their colour-coded ability to depict anatomical and/or functional information . For example, X-ray imaging is purely anatomical imaging modality, PET imaging provides functional ( and molecular) data, while MRI and optical imaging are capable of providing anatomical and functional information depending on the choice of the protocol or mode of operation.
Question:Which imaging modality is capable of providing purely anatomical information?
Answer:X-ray imaging
